name: hanami (itch)
description:
花見
hanami is a centuries-old japanese custom of enjoying the transient beauty of flowers by picnicking under a blooming sakura tree.

this is an interactive fiction game created for flower jam!

🍃 control the wind with the arrow keys to determine where cherry blossoms fall
🌸 persuade two very argumentative samurai to stop fighting by deciding what topics to drop from conversation

(this may have some bugs - we're planning to fix it soon!)
